All Classes

Class Description
Actions
All possible actions that a player can perform
ActionsHandler
Class used to handle actions triggered by user-input in the playing stage.
ActionsUpdateMessage
message sent from server to client to tell the client which actions in-game are allowed
AllCardsMenuController
Controller class for the AllCards stage that will be diplayed when the challenger has to choose the available cards for each players.
AlreadyExistingSessionException
exception used when client want to create a Session with the same name of an other one
ApolloMove
Represents the move in case the Player has the card APOLLO
AppMain  
ArtemisTurn
Represents the turn in case the Player has the card ARTEMIS
AthenaTurn
Represents the turn in case the Player has the card ATHENA
AtlasBuild
Represents the build if the Player has the card ATLAS
Block
Represents the different type of blocks.
Board  
Board.boxChanged
Represents class to keep track of the changes on the board
BoardUndoMessage
message from server to client used for return to the beginning of the turn cancelling the move just made
BoardUpdateBuildMessage
message from server to client used for update the building on the client board
BoardUpdatePlaceMessage
message from server to client used for update the position of the worker on the client board
Box
Represents the cell of the board
Box
Represents the cell where I can build/move or place a Worker.
Build
Strategy Pattern interface for the Build
Building
Class used to represent buildings in the PlayingStageController
CantGoUpException
exception used when client want to go up but you can't because your opponent used the God equals to Athena
CardAlreadySetException
exception used when client want to reselect a card, you can select a God only one time
CardUpdateMessage
message from server to client used for update the god of the client chosen
ChatUpdateMessage
message from server to client used for update the chat
CLI
Represents the game interface via command line
Client
It represents the client and takes care of receiving and sending messages to the server and updating the client-side status
ClientBoard
It keeps the status of the client side board
ClientCLIApp  
ClientConnection
Interface used to create a SocketClientConnection
ClientGUIApp  
ClientInitMessage
message from server to client used to initialize the game when the session is full
ClientStatus
It keeps information about the turn, the color, the card and the actions
Color
All possible color that represent a player
Controller
Controller class for MVC pattern implementation.
CreateMenuController
Controller for the create match menu.
DeckUpdateMessage
message from server to client used for update the deck of the game
DefaultBuild
Represents the build if the Player has no God / has a God that doesn't modifies the build rules.
DefaultMove
Represents the move if the Player has no card / has a card that doesn't modifies the move rules.
DefaultTurn
Represents Player's turn in case the game is without cards
DefaultWin
Represents the class which models the default win condition
DemeterTurn
Represents the turn in case the Player has the card DEMETER
EndController
Class which represent the end match dialog.
FullSessionException
exception used when client want to join a Session which is full
Game
Class which represents the model itself
God
enumeration that has every divinity that a Player could use
GodObject
Class used to encapsulate images and label for the god choosen that will be displayed in the playing stage on the left-bottom corner.
HephaestusTurn
Represents the turn in case the Player has the card HEPHAESTUS
InvalidBuildException
exception used when client want to build in a incorrect way
InvalidChoiceMessage
message from server to client used to communicate a choice error for example an invalid move
InvalidMoveException
exception used when client want to move in a incorrect way
InvalidPlayersNumberException
exception used when client want to create a Session with one or more than 3 players
InvalidUsernameException
exception used when client want to join a Session with the name equals to another Player
JoinMenuController
Controller for the JoinMenu.fxml stage.
LostMessage
message from server to client used to communicate that the client lost
MainController
Class used to handle each stage based on the Message received by the Client.
Message  
MinotaurMove
Represents the move in case the Player has the card MINOTAUR
Move
Strategy Pattern interface for the Move
Observable<T>  
Observer<T>  
PanWin
Extends the class DefaultWin because it adds a post-condition and has the same pre-conditions
Pawn
Class that inherits the proprieties from ImageView.
Player
Represent one of the 2 or 3 players that play the match
PlayerBuildDomeMessage
message from client to server used to build a dome it's valid message if only you have the God equals to Atlas
PlayerBuildMessage
message from client to server used to build
PlayerCardChoiceMessage
message from client to server used to chose a God
PlayerChatMessage
message from client to server used to send a message in the chat
PlayerCreateSessionMessage
message from client to server used to create a new session
PlayerDeckMessage
message from client to server used to chose the God that will be used in the game
PlayerEndMessage
message from client to server used to terminate its own turn
PlayerLostException
exception used when client want to make a move but he can't because it lost
PlayerMoveMessage
message from client to server used to move the worker selected
PlayerPlacePawnsMessage
message from client to server used to place its own Worker on the board at the beginning of the game
PlayerRemoveMessage
message used to remove a Player from the Session
PlayerRetrieveSessions
it is a ping message
PlayerSelectMessage
message from client to server used to select the Worker
PlayerSelectSession
message from client to server used to join an existing Session
PlayerUndoMessage
message from client to server used to return at the beginning of its own turn
PlayingStageController
Controller for the PlayingStage.fxml stage.
Printer
Represents the class that takes care of formatting the outputs
PrometheusTurn
Represents the turn in case the Player has the card PROMETHEUS
RemoteView
RemoteView extends the abstract class View.
RemovedMessage
message from server to client used to remove the Worker of the Player that has lost
SelectCardMenuController
Controller for the SelectCard.fxml stage.
Server
The server is used to handle each SocketClientConnection separately thanks to an ExecutorService which creates a thread pool.
ServerApp  
Session
A Session is used to handle the pre-match.
SessionListMessage
message from server to client used to update the list of the existing Session
SessionNotExistsException
exception used when client want to join a Session which not exists
SessionObject
A SessionObject is used in the JoinMenuController to represent each Session in the session's TableView.
SimpleGameException
exception used when the game is simple
SocketClientConnection
A SocketClientConnection is used by Server to handle the Client connection.
StartMenuController
Controller for the StartMenu.fxml stage that is the first stage loaded.
Status  
SuccessfulCreate
message from server to client used to communicate that the creation of the game was successful
SuccessfulJoin
message from server to client used to communicate that the joining was successful
Turn
Strategy Pattern interface for the Turn
TurnNotStartedException
exception used when client want to play but it isn't its own Turn
TurnUpdateMessage
message from server to client used to update the client turn
UsernameDialog
Dialog used to insert the player's username.
View
View is the abstract view for the MVC pattern.
WaitController
When a player is waiting for other players to join the session it will be placed in a waiting stage until the Game starts.
Win
Strategy Pattern interface for the Win condition for the Player
WinMessage
message from server to client used to communicate that the client won
Worker
Rappresenta una pedina del Player
